frontMatter.title: Positioning Messages
frontMatter.metaDescription: A real message to test against the target market. It could be a tagline, short pitch, or an ad message. Eventually, it is the way the product is defined to consumers on important attributes.

checklist.question: Where do you want to position the brand in peoples' minds?
checklist.expectation: The team should have identified the product placement with respect to cost and unique offerings.

checklist.question: How effective is your message?
checklist.expectation: The positioning message should be short, easy to comprehend and easy to remember.
